Summary Heading: good for the location and price.
Summary: We stayed at the anaheim express inn just for 2 nights, the stay was good with no issues. breakfast was a bit lacking but have noticed the 'continental breakfast' is pretty average no matter what chain hotel you stay in. Staff were helpful when needed and no problems having a space to park the car. Maybe a bit far for a family to walk to disney but  we didn't have a problem and definitely saved on the cost of parking.
Manager Response: Dear Lucytravelling91, Thank you very much for your feedback with nice compliments about our staff as well as our parking services. I will share this review with our staff. We look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit Anaheim. Have a great weekend!

Summary: Friendly  Customer service stuff, very close to Disneyland, comfortable large room, come with continental breakfast, walking distance to restaurants and fast food, great location will come back and stay again.  Special thanks to Ms. Joanna customer service for taking care of all our needs.
Manager Response: Dear Johnson S,  Thank you so much for feedback with nice compliments about our staff as well as our rooms and services.  I will share this review with our staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great value, convenient location, friendly reception, with some serious drawbacks
Summary: Overall, this modest motel is a great value for families on a tight budget who are looking for a cheap place to crash after a day at Disneyland.  1) Reception -- Both of the people we dealt with at the reception desk were genuinely friendly and helpful. The young man who checked us in was new and obviously nervous, especially when his manager hovered.  There was a minor billing snafu in that our card received a pending 2-day room charge for our already prepaid room. When we inquired about this, the young woman at the reception desk told us the charges had been voided immediately after being charged and should soon show this on our account. She was right, the next day those pending charges were gone. Someone took the Do Not Disturb sign from our door. I asked for another at the
Manager Response: Dear  Budget_Traveler:  Thank you so much for your comments as they are very valuable to us.  We hope to see you again next time when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: My wife and I, son and wife and 4 kids had a great time. Great hotel - 20-30 min walk (depending upon how fast your walk) to Disneyland/California Adventure or take the shuttle from across the street. Great breakfast with wide range of food choices. Quiet location and clean. Great service. Lots of off site restraunts options within walking distance. Outdoor pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Hello Bruce J and the Family!  We are so happy to hear you had a great time staying with the Anaheim Express Inn.  Your feedback and compliments are greatly appreciated.  Please give me a call directly next time when you visit Anaheim; I will personally make a reservation for your family.  Thank you so much for your time to write the review.  Take care!

Summary: Clean, comfortable, quiet. Rooms are large. Very friendly staff. Continental breakfast consists of cereal, juice, muffins, doughnuts, yogurt, oranges, toast, coffee, milk, tea. A great start for the day. Take the ART (Anaheim Resort Transit ) bus in front of the Doubletree Inn on Harbor Blvd. just around the corner. Buy passes at the Disneyland park (kiosk in the bus arrival area) Room has a microwave and fridge. Denny's and Carl's JR. nearby Love this place and will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Sue B,    Thank you so much for taking the time to post the review and the perfect rating! We appreciate you compliments about our clean and comfortable accommodation as well as quietness...Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We would love to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.  Take care!

Summary: I always stay at Anaheim Express Inn Main gate, Anaheim, California  The room is always clean and ready when I check in, I am in a wheelchair and I Like a king size bed, and they are one of the few in the area that has a handicap accessible room with a king size bed. I always try to stay in the same room, and I'm usually accommodated when available. The staff is very professional, when I check in with Joanna she's always friendly and always smiling, and when I check out early the next morning, and when I early I mean 0400, Lee is always friendly and ready to go when I am. I'm very satisfied staying at Anaheim Express Inn.
Manager Response: Dear RandyWW,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of our hotel as well as the perfect rating. I am glad that you were pleased with the great service you received from our staff. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with Joanna, Lee and the rest of the team. Thank you again for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Take care!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for me and my family during our Disney vacation. The rooms are very basic and were clean with nice bathrooms that had amazing water pressure in the shower. The pool and hot tub are on the smaller side, but perfect after a long day at the parks. The reason why I didn't give this a full 5 star rating is because I felt that the queen size beds were more of a full size bed and also during my stay there was a guest there that was disruptive one night with non-stop yacking right outside my room for at least a good 40 minutes. I did report this to the front desk the next morning. Also, the front desk staff is awesome, especially the gentleman that worked the night shift who provided me with a couple of good options for pizza delivery in the area (I picked Dominos
Manager Response: Dear Ashesofhearts, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with our room cleanliness and great service from our staff.  Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim

Summary: Great location but, rooms very run down and dirty. Flies and cockroaches. Staff nice. Pool was clean and breakfast is what they offer. So you must weight your options, cleanliness or location. Tough call.
Manager Response: Dear Tony M, I apologize that you were not pleased with the cleanliness of our hotel.  Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing. I would be happy to speak with you further. If you would like, please contact me directly, tammy.ngo@anainn.com. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary Heading: How clean the room got my attention.  I also liked the service at the desk and breakfast was fresh / tasty
Summary: Location is Perfect!  Parking was great. Room was big, new, fresh and updated.  Breakfast was fresh fruits, eggs, waffle my favorite!   I am going again to stay there!  Thank you for runnig a very nice hotel!
Manager Response: Dear akayandy,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad to hear you were pleased with our room cleanliness  and the complimentary continental breakfast. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Anaheim Express Inn Maingate. Everything was great! No problems! It was close to the convention center and Disneyland and restaurants and shopping. Their continental breakfast was just what we needed every morning!
Manager Response: Hello Marc M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with our accommodation and complimentary continental breakfast. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice enough rooms. Quiet.  Nice continental breakfast. The Rooms were a little outdated. Could be darker in the rooms.  The staff was Very nice.  Located in a good place.  Easy to reserve.  Pool situation was ok.
Manager Response: Hello Melanie,  Thank you for your review and choosing the Anaheim Express Inn Maingate. Your warm compliments concerning our team and breakfast is greatly appreciated. If you're traveling in our area again soon or in the future, please do not hesitate to call us. Thank you again for your time.   Have a wonderful day   Sincerely, Management and Staff

Summary: Nice and clean room. On arrival we got a free upgrade to a room with one big bed. Very friendly and helpfull staff. From the hotel there is about 50 minutes drive to LAX. Good breakfast. Within walking distance you find several restaurants. There is also 2 gas stations next door.  The hotel has a small pool.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you so much for the great review you have shared regarding your experience at our hotel. Your warm compliments concerning the cleanliness of our hotel and the accommodations are greatly appreciated. We look forward to serving you again soon.   Have a wonderful day

Summary: it was clean and good  for t he money, the staff was very friendly  I would stay there again! oh and thanks for printing my boarding pass for free. also the continental breakfast was great. and was very conveniently located.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you so much for the great review you have shared regarding your experience at our hotel. Your warm compliments concerning our staff and continental breakfast is greatly appreciated. We look forward to serving you again soon.   Sincerely,  Management & Staff

Summary: After a long day at Disneyland, staying at a hotel with a short distance to drive is great. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Staff was very nice even at 2 AM. Breakfast the next morning was good.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you so much for the great review you have shared regarding your experience at our hotel. Your warm compliments concerning our team is greatly appreciated. We look forward to serving you again soon. Have a wonderful day!  Sincerely, Management and Staff

Summary: We stayed here for our three day trip to Disneyland. It was very close and in a great location. Near Disneyland as well as a ton of food choices. The room was very large, comfortable, and clean. When we go back to Disneyland we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear S8201TItammyb,  I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay. One of the greatest rewards of my job is receiving encouraging feedback such as yours. We are glad to hear that you are happy with our  spacious, comfortable and clean guestrooms. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again next time you back to our area.

Summary: room was clean, beds were so comfortable,average quality .room was hidden off in a corner,smothered by dressers as if it was a storage area.view out the window,more dressers cluttering up the area.if different room stay would have been decent.
Manager Response: Dear jhernandez115,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We appreciate your compliments about our new comfortable beds as well as cleanliness of our  guestrooms.  As the result of the recent remodeling, we have decided to donate all of our excess furniture to Habitat for Humanity. Unfortunately they were delayed in picking up this furniture.  This prevented us from providing you with desired view.  Thank you so much for your understanding and we hope you will give us another chance of service.  Take care!

Summary: Booked this place for one night before a half marathon at Disneyland. Perfectly fine if you are not planning on staying for an extended trip or spending much time in the room. While the room seemed clean and the beds were comfortable, it could use a few upgrades and more lights. The room was very dark and the "main light" did not light up the whole room so we had to turn every light on.   Also, the pool/jacuzzi area was not clean. The night before the race we decided to relax in the jacuzzi for a bit. When walking up to the jacuzzi, we noticed two unshelled hard boiled eggs next to the jacuzzi, as if someone had been eating them or maybe they were even thrown into the area as they were a bit smashed. We decided to go in the jacuzzi anyway. After about 20 mins in the jacuzzi, my
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking your time to tell us about your stay. Your feedback is vital, as we want to know the good and the bad. I am sorry to read about your experience, as this is not what we want. I want to apologize for all the challenges that you experienced in the hotel room with lighting, hard boiled egg in the Jacuzzi, and the issues in the bathroom. These concerns you mentioned are being reviewed by management to ensure that they addressed and we can prevent this from happening again. Thank you again for your feedback and I hope you will give us another chance in the future.   Sincerely, Management and Staff

Summary: Great for families with children. Close to the park and restaurants,  target is close and gas station next door,  perfect for a long day and just go to sleep take a shower and doing again,  no safe and good a/c.
Manager Response: Hello Marco,  Thank you so much for your great review you have shared with us regarding your experience at our hotel. Please contact us directly in the future and we will make sure you get a room with a safe in it. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you in the future.   Sincerely, Management and Staff

Summary: Positives-close enough to Disneyland & Disneyland California Park; there are shuttles that run from the Hilton hotel on the main road, which is a short walk. Plenty of restaurants also on the main road to choose from e.g. Denny's , Italian, Mexican, Thai restaurants, very comfy beds, rooms have basic kitchen equipment with a bar fridge Negatives- found it quite noisy as the car park is right outside the rooms, so when people are checking in & out at all times the noise carries right into the room, not very big rooms, just basic and bathroom doesn't have a vanity & mirror- this is outside the bathroom and is a kitchen sink as well (Not a fan of this at all & found it inconvenient but it's saving space I guess)
Manager Response: Hello Cathie,  Thank you for your valuable feedback you have provided ourselves and our fellow travelers with. We are delighted that you enjoyed the location of our property, very comfy beds and the restaurants that are near by. Nevertheless, we will certainly address the items we are able to update as soon as possible. Thank you again for sharing your concerns. We look forward to better serving you in the future.   Sincerely, Management and Staff

Summary Heading: MUST VISIT IF GOING TO DISNEYLAND
Summary: I loved staying here it was my first time. Very close to bus to take to DISNEYLAND. Reasonable pricing with free breakfast and a mini fridge. No matter the time we left the room it was always clean with new towels when we cam back for the night.
Manager Response: Dear nathaliemadrigal,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were happy with our location, cleanliness of guestrooms as well as the amenities. Thank you again for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Been there for 3 nights. Room is spacious, comfy beds, nice bathroom. You got more from what you pay. Got a great deal online and was worried since the price was so low, but had a great experience in all ways.  Friendly staff also deserve to be mentioned. Recommended!
Manager Response: Dear Cricket R,   Thank you so much for your review with a perfect ratings!  I am happy to hear that you were pleased with our spacious guestroom, comfy beds, nice bathroom as well as the great service you received from our staff. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Take care!

Summary: I would like to thank from the bottom of my heart to the Manager Tammy, who understood my situation. I made the booking online and cancelled the booking as dates changed, and the app TripCase sent me to the wrong hotel (my mistake I did not update the app info). When I realised, I was being charged by two hotels at the same time. I tried to cancel online but it was no longer cancellable. I went to speak to the hotel manager directly, hoping she could understand and refund me for the days I have been charged (without even have checked in). Tammy was so nice, she refunded me and told me "Go! You are missing park hours by being here worried about it" She was umbelievable. I was not expecting such kindness. I really must thank you!
Manager Response: Hi Lu U, Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice note regarding our interaction.  I hope you enjoyed your trip to Anaheim. If you find you will be returning to our area, please contact me directly for your room reservation.

Summary: Nice hotel located 3 blocks south of the entrance of Disneyland. Walking distance? Sure is BUT I would still highly recommend using your rental car or a quick Uber ride. Think about it, do you really want to walk going, walk all day in the park(s) and walk back?    Another note of walking - walking distance to many different restaurants as to food delivery should not be an option. Nice franchise restaurants along with a few local spots to visit for food of all 3-6 meals of the day/night. If you have that late-night in need of something, a gas station is right next store. They have pretty much anything you might need and open 24hrs. It's December here when I traveled, but the pool and hot tub were available. Nice area off to the corner of the hotel. Continental breakfast was a
Manager Response: Dear NYCEyez,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with the hotel location, complimentary continental breakfast as well as our clean room and outdoor pool and hot tub. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again soon. Take care!

Summary Heading: Ok sort of hotel. Staff is friendly and very helpful.
Summary: Staff is friendly and very helpful. Quality for breakfast can be improved. Basic necessity like bathing soap bars, towels should be provided everyday without asking for it. Front desk staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Vijaykumar M,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with the great service you received from our staff. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to Anaheim. Take care!

Summary Heading: A tidy, comfortable place to stay.
Summary: Great location, reasonably close to Disneyland and bus stops Staff and Manager friendly and helpful. Rooms were a good size and were serviced daily. It had everything we required and meet our expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Robyn P,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with the great service you received from our staff and manager. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to Anaheim.  Take care!

Summary: Spent a week here while we visited Disneyland and it had everything i could of asked for.  1.5 km from Disneyland,  Dennys just across the road, plenty of other restaurants close by and a laundromat next door,  made the location perfect. If you don't want to walk a taxi from Disney was less than 10 dollars.  Breakfast was enough to get you through the morning and beds really comfortable, yes, maybe the motel room is a bit dated. No flat screen TV here. But we were getting back to the room around 11pm and gone again by 9am , so an aging tv and paintwork really didn't bother me.  Very affordable and comfortable with everything close by
Manager Response: Hello Robert,  Thank you so much for your great review you shared regarding your experience at our hotel. We appreciate the valuable feedback you have provided ourselves with. We have scheduled for all the rooms to be updated with flat screen TV's in the next couple of months. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you again in the future.   Best regards, Anaheim Express Management and Staff

Summary Heading: McDonald's breakfast is better then this place...
Summary: Pros: bed was comfortable  Cons: Continental breakfast is awful. Cold boiled eggs,  cheap powder cream for semi cold coffee.üò§.  Other then bananas everything else is unhealthy. Have stayed at other places similar and their continental breakfast  exceeds what this place offers. Shower does not have a hand rail to hold for safety, almost slipped. No shelves to put ones personal items. Wish that they would replace those guzzling shower heads, the one in our room wastes so much water. The price compared to other similar is too high. Oh well won't stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Margarita,  Thank you for taking your time to share your feedback with us. I am disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We strive to make sure each guest is taken care of, as guest satisfaction is number one to us. We hope you kindly consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: I was discouraged about staying here as our Uber driver stated that he's lived in Anaheim for 12 years and has never heard of this place. Check-in was a breeze. We stayed in 227. No elevators but the stairs aren't all that bad. The room was nice and clean. 2 queens. We stayed for 2 nights while doing to Disneyland and it was pleasant. Breakfast isn't that bad. Cereal, yogurt, boiled eggs, fruit, pastries, bagels and toast. Juices and coffee. Beds were comfy but sheets and pillows had a strong bleach odor. TV channels were great. Outdoor pool that we were unable to enjoy after Disney. Overall, I'd consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear AngeliqueOnTheGo, Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with the great service you received from our staff as well as our complimentary breakfast and the room cleanliness . I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to Anaheim.

Summary: I can't say for all of their rooms, but the one we were supposed to sleep in was disgusting. I went to the bathroom and saw a roach crawl out of the bath tub drain. Went to wash my hands and yet another roach crawled out from the sink drain. Even more roaches came out from various other crevices in the room. Not only that but there were ants and other unidentifiable little bugs crawling on the sink counter and other areas of the room. All these different bugs at once and you know it's not just one random big coming in the door that night.   Upon seeing this my friend and I immediately removed our luggage from the room and went and asked for a refund.   The man at the desk said he could not refund us at that time and we would have to wait until Monday to speak to the manager.
Manager Response: Dear Yessiejessie09.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. We are disappointed to hear that our facility did not meet your expectations.  We have shared your comments with our pest control service.  Again, thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and close to Disney and Convention Center
Summary: I had to come for a family emergency and was unsure how long I was going to stay. I found this hotel and it is clean, affordable (no gym but does have a small pool), free parking, and very responsive staff. My week actually turned into 3 weeks and they were very accommodating even though there were conventions in town. I was able to work remotely on there wireless connection for 8-9 hours a day. I would definitely recommend this place if you are coming to Disney and want a less expensive, no frills Hotel option. I did see a lot of families and did not hear of any complaints. Always felt safe here also.
Manager Response: Dear Bdsouthard,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad that you were pleased with the great service you received from our staff. I will be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. Thank you for choosing the Anaheim Express Inn. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to the area.  Take care!

Summary: This place is very close to disneyland and 20 minute walking distance or 8 minutes uber ride. Not much fancy but helps to save little more $ and allow to spend that in the Disney land. Hotel management should think about the cleanness of the room as it is not up to the standard.
Manager Response: Dear Vanjikumaran,  Thank you for your valuable feedback you have provided to us and fellow travelers with. We are definitely addressing the issue with constantly scheduling deep cleaning on all of our rooms. I hope that this experience does not deter you from staying with us in the future.   Best Regards, Anaheim Express Management and staff

Summary: I've been on trip advisor for a few years and have only bothered reviewing for the great places i've stayed and visited. I feel compelled to leave a review though for this hotel, because I think it is completely unfair how they run their business.   I booked two rooms for my coworkers and I for a consortium class in hopes of saving money, but I ended up spending more money! One of the people I was with could not make it and I tried canceling her room within the 24 hours and they told me i'd have to pay a $90 cancellation fee! WHAT, I was in the 24 hours. That was the total cost of her room. My whole goal for staying here was to not spend over $50 on just myself. Also having more than one car is $10 for parking although it states parking is free onsite. I tried talking with staff
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review and give us your feedback. I am sorry to hear that we fell short on your expectations.  Although, we strictly follow the third party cancellation policies, we have more flexibility when you book directly with us here at the Anaheim Express Inn.  We hope that you kindly consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely, Anaheim Express Management and staff

Summary: This was a great option for our group as we all wanted to save money going on a trip to Disneyland. It was clean and had everything you needed for a good night's sleep. The staff was helpful and divided our final bill 4 ways upon checkout. It was close to a bus line but also close enough to walk to Disneyland as well. Good choice! It's not beautiful but was well maintained and clean. The shower was great!!
Manager Response: Dear Gwen W, Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at the Anaheim Express Inn. We happy to hear you have enjoyed our service as well as room accommodation. I will share your compliments to our team. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim. Take care!

Summary: The Anaheim Express Inn is within walking distance (10min) of the Anaheim Convention Center and is a greta bargin for the price.  The room was clean, there was a smaller pool/hot tub to relax in afterwards and a min mart around the corner from the hotel.  There were plenty of upscale hotels in the area for a higher price and plenty of upscale restaurants (Morton's, McCormick & Schmick's etc..) surrounding the convention center.  Disneyland is also a few minutes away by car.
Manager Response: Dear Richard M, On behalf of all staff at the Anaheim Express Inn, thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay.  We are glad to hear your compliments about our guestroom  cleanliness, convenient location and great value for your money. We hope to see you again next time when you come back to Anaheim.

Summary: We decided to take our 4 year old grandson to Disneyland. We searched for many rooms and many deals. One of the only hotels with no resort fee. No frills, but the bathrooms are clean, the refrigerator and microwave were a great convenience!!!! Beds were surprisingly comfortable!!!Actually not "walking distance" to Disneyland with a 4 year old, but waking distance to the toy story parking lot to catch the shuttle. Staff was helpful in finding us discount tickets. Pool was clean and refreshing!!! Total for 3 nights was $150 cheaper than any we found!!! We will definitely stay here again, as we have 2 more grandkids that will be coming of Disney age soon!!!! Thanks for the hassle free stay!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Nicole H, Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at the Anaheim Express Inn. We happy to hear you have enjoyed our service as well as room accommodation and gave us a perfect rating. I will share your compliments to our team. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Vacation to California -The Beach & Universal Studios
Summary: The location was great, all the staff were very pleasant to us (especially Jennifer), we did not have any issues with our room, the rooms are a somewhat outdated but I mean they were worth the price we paid.  The beds were comfortable, the microwave & fridge worked, the rooms were cleaned when we returned.   If I am to come back to California, I would like to stay here again.  The breakfast was just basic (don't expect a buffet).  We just has coffee.  The parking was free, which other hotels charge to park or have limited parking, we would come back late and find parking fast.  Overall experience was a plus, was not overcharged, I was charged a deposit for each room but I was refunded the deposit quickly.  Like I said, I would come back and here again..
Manager Response: I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! We strive to satisfy our guests and it's always a pleasure to hear that our efforts are noticed. Thank you for the the rating. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know we meet your expectations with our guest service (Jennifer), parking, comfortable beds and the cleanliness of our rooms. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!  Best Regards Management and Staff

Summary: Great place to stay for a short trip to Disneyland. We only used this room to sleep and shower, most of our day was spent outside. Room was clean and bed was comfortable. I recommend bringing extra blankets I could never get the room temperature to my liking.
Manager Response: Dear vss23, I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! We strive to satisfy our guests and it's always a pleasure to hear that our efforts are noticed. Thank you for the high rating! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know we meet your expectations with our comfortable beds and the cleanliness of our rooms. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!  Best Regards Management and Staff

Summary: Booked thru Expedia.   Two days before arrival hotel personnel called and wanted to know how we got the rate we prepaid.   They were irritated and asked lots of questions although ultimately honored our 5 night prepaid stay.   Desk clerks are unfriendly and unknowledgeable about the area.   Not helpful at all.   Our room had large cockroaches that we killed.   We reported to the front desk and nothing was done.   Shower faucet was partially stripped so hard to turn off or regulate.   Extremely small pool.   Breakfast was overcrowded with not enough space to accommodate the number of guests.  Food very minimal and cheap.  As far as being walking distance to Disneyland, that's a stretch.   Would take more than 30 min.   Spend a little more and get a better place with a shuttle,
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review. I am sorry to hear that we fell short on your expectations. We take guest services very seriously and rarely hear complaints about our staff. I will be sharing your comments with our Front desk, Maintenance, and Housekeeping staff. Thanks for bringing these issues to our attention thereby allowing us to improve. We hope you give us another opportunity to serve your future hospitality needs when visiting the Disneyland Resort Area.   Sincerely  Anaheim Express Management & Staff.

Summary: This hotel is about a mile from Disneyland and is handy to the ART Anaheim resort shuttle. Actually there are restaurants around and so you are located rather well. The hotel itself is all right. It is clean and continental breakfast is included. There are fancier and more upscale hotels nearby but here is our reasoning for going more economical. We spend most of the day out and about, Whether at Disney or elsewhere, so why spend so much more just for a place to sleep. As long as it is clean and comfortable, its all good The beds are good here. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear craig c, I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! We strive to satisfy our guests and it's always a pleasure to hear that our efforts are noticed. Thank you the perfect rating!We appreciate you taking the time to let us know we meet your expectations with breakfast, our comfortable beds and the cleanliness of our rooms. We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!  Best Regards Management and Staff

Summary: i would like to give excellent customer service to joanna. .She gave me very good advicesregarding our trip.  Thamk you very much joanna.  I was dissapointed  with the manager,  no customer care quality. My stay were all excellent except with manager.  Manager should go for more CUSTOMER CARE  TRAINING..
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth:   It was a pleasure speaking with you today and discussing your stay stay with us in May of 2016.  I am sorry that the check in did not proceed as expected.  If you find yourself returning to the Anaheim area in the future, please contact me directly so I may personally make your reservation.  Thank you again for your time.

Summary Heading: It was good for the price
Summary: Stayed here for 6 nights - booked here cause it was not to expensive - was a little shocked when first arrived and wondered if I had booked the dodgiest motel in Anaheim - it is quite dingy looking at first glance and reading the signs on the walls that say be careful as the building can cause cancer was not great - HOWEVER - the reception staff are extremely friendly and professional and could not do enough for us, the included breakfast was good and wifi was included in the rate.  The rooms where old but they had really comfortable beds and had everything required like a coffee machine, small fridge and microwave. Disneyland was about a 20min walk - overall it was a cheap and cheerful place to stay.

However we did look around the breakfast area and it was nice too.

Summary: In short: it's a short walk to the Woody Lot to take the bus right into Disney.  The rooms were very comfortable and the price was good.  OK now for some details.  The breakfast has a lot of variety and will carb you up for your day of Disney.  My wife and I are a park open-to-close couple.  Breakfast started at seven and it worked well for us.  If you go one block up the hotel rates skyrocket. If you go a block down they don't charge all that much different.  It's what drew me to the hotel.  Walking to the disney parking bus was the same distance physically as if I was walking from a hotel across the street from Disneyland.  Meaning I didn't feel like I was super far away. The bus ride is super short.  You're right next to a Dennys, carls jr, and taco bell which I like all 3.
Manager Response: Dear John L.  Thank you so much for your review and high ranking. It is always good to hear that our efforts were appreciated. We hope to see you again the next time you are visiting the Disneyland resort area!   Mgmt

Summary: This was our second stay here, my wife took care of our first review so I feel like it's my turn  to write something.  Distance to the park: If you're walking, you're gonna be disappointed because it's pretty far in terms of the " a couple of blocks from the park" estimate most travel sites give you. If you have the parking pass, it's perfect, no more than a 5 minute drive with lights and intersections, you take longer to find in a spot in the garage or whatever parking area Disney decides they want to fill up first.  Food: The continental breakfast is pretty basic fare, but it's free so if you're on a budget it'll be like eating breakfast at home so plus points for that. The eating area is small though, and since you can't take food to your room it can be a little awkward

Furthermore, there are so many shop and store around like ampm, 7eleven and Target; thus it's easy to buy whatever you want for your vacation. If you are hungry, it takes 15 min to walk down the street and find one of many different restaurants there. If you want an economy and convenient hotel, this is a good place.

We sped up that process by walking to the Disneyland parking lot across the street from the convention center and taking a shuttle from there, these shuttles run one after another, with no more than a 2 minute wait, this was especially welcome after walking around the park all day. Overall, it looked like the more people in & out the better and not much attention to the property itself.

We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

Summary: Stayed here between July 9-12. Paid $87 a night plus tax. Pay anymore than that, and I'd say look elsewhere. Got there at 11 a.m. Thursday, said I could check in early, for a fee $20, and the check in lady wasn't budging. "So, you HAVE rooms available, so we can check in, but only if we pay extra?! I have been to other hotels, that DON'T charge early check in, cause well, they want you to come back. Room second floor all the way at the end, strange smell in room, never went away, sink water was kinda stinky, wifi is poor, but kids said bed was good, overall everything just average. Pool and Hot Tub look WAY bigger online.Much smaller in person. Free breakfast is not really worth it, hard boiled eggs? Really? Like coffee? Another disappointment. Walking to Disneyland will take 20

Summary: The hotel is close to the convention centre, Target, Disney and many restaurants. The room is big. The breakfast is basic. Wi-fi isn't good, but it's free. Parking is also free. The furniture in the room is really old, and so is the TV and the air conditioner.
Manager Response: Dear milasalata-  Thank you for reviewing the Anaheim Express Inn.  We are happy to hear you have enjoyed the location, the spacious room and complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you again next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice but not within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: Super nice staff but it wasn't walking distance to Disneyland .....and I do look for that when I'm in Anaheim.....the room was really nice though & the shower was perfect.  Breakfast was nice to have in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy M-  Thank you for your recent stay at the Anaheim Express Inn and you feedback.  We appreciate your compliments about our staff, room accommodation and complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to your next stay with us,

Summary: We went to Disney on October 2014 with my husband and 3 year son. Our experience was great, the hotel was clean, the staff was very polite, the room was well equiped (tv, mini fridge, microwave, coffe maker, so you can buy food, make sandwichs for snack time in the parks, if you like), the bed was comfortable everything was great in every way, in the front desk you can ask for your disney tickets and they will contact someone who sells the tickets and includes a shuttle bus that take you from the hotel to the parks and viceversa with no extra charge. We get to the hotel early so the check in was not available yet, but they gave us the room (cause it was not occupied) if the room is not available you can park your car and go to the park, when you return you can make the check in.
Manager Response: Dear Laura M-  Thank you so much for taking the time to review the Anaheim Express Inn.  We are very happy to hear you had a great stay.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim.  Take care!

Summary: My party and I stayed at this hotel back in April and it was in fact the second time visiting for us.  On our visits to Anaheim we have stayed at various hotels along Harbor, Katella, Disney way and so far out of all of them this location had the softest beds.  The customer service was excellent, the rooms are spacious, clean and quiet. The pool is nice, the hot tub is nice and even though its a good walking distance you have the option of catching the shuttle across the street if your on your way to Disneyland.  The continental breakfast is standard muffins, cereal, coffee, juice which was fine for us since we took our meals in the Disney parks. The staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Mariah4travelMouse,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at the Anaheim Express Inn.  We happy to hear you have enjoyed our service as well as room accommodation and gave us a perfect rating.  I will share your compliments to our team. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Just what we needed for our Disneyland trip!
Summary: Just stayed there for three nights during our trip to Disneyland. Room was clean, the bed was spacious and fairly comfortable, the bathroom looked like it was renovated more recently, swimming pool was clean, free WiFi worked well in our room, breakfast was basic but good enough (hard boiled eggs, cereal, bagels, toast, yogurt, muffins, etc), and it was located by the Toy Story parking lot which made transportation to and from the park very easy. We could hear kids running around upstairs a few times, but we understand that there are excited kids ready to go to Disneyland, so it wasn't too big of a deal. Overall it was quiet in the room, the air conditioner worked well, and the room had a refrigerator and an OLD, but working, microwave. The only fault I saw was that at one point

Summary: Our family recently stayed at the Anaheim Express Inn for a Disneyland trip, and we were very happy with the stay! The room was clean and comfortable. We were on a budget and like that it was affordable. We had absolutely no complaints. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Kduran04: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear you had a great stay. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Very nice hotel to stay in. Hotel clerk was very helpful and polite at check in. Room was very clean, mattresses were very comfortable. Only complaint is that the lighting in the rooms was a bit dim. No main overhead lighting, just one table lamp and one ceiling light in the corner. Refrigerator, microwave, TV, free WiFi in rooms. Pool area was a bit dirty, but the pool itself was nice. Continental breakfast was decent, and well stocked. Right next door to Carl's Jr., Denny's, Roscoe's Chicken & Waffles, and a gas station. Stayed for 3 nights to go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Kendra L,  On behalf of entire staff here at the Anaheim Express Inn, thank you so much for your feedback regarding your stay.  . Summary: We stayed at this hotel as a couple early June for 4 nights. Due to a long flight delay we didn't arrive until midnight and were pleasantly greeted by a guy on the check in desk.  We got a choice of whether we would like to stay top or bottom floor, we chose top. Rooms very big and roomy, 2 large double beds which were very very comfy. TV didn't work but was fixed within 10mins of reporting it.   Fridge and microwave in the room  - very handy! Big mirror and nice big bathroom. For the price, this room was great! The only downside which was specific to our room and not the property overall, was that we were on the end behind the wall so there was little to no sunlight coming into the room throughout the day it was very dark. Had we intended on staying inside more, I may have

Summary: Stayed here from May 30 to June 4 2015. Room was very clean and decent.  Desk staff were friendly and even took the time to call for transportation for us when we checked out. It was about a mile walk from Disneyland,  but it was a very nice walk to and from the Inn.  Both my 5 and 10 year old along with my wife and I,  did the walk daily with no problem. We went to Disneyland/California Adventure 5 days in a row! Then being there all day and night, the walk back was easy and felt safe, even after midnight. . ALOT of people walked to and from Disneyland,  so we started conversations which made the walk seem not so far.  Well lighted sidewalk. There were restaurants very near the Inn. The pool was decent,  enough for the kids to relax a little. . For $78.00 a night,  I highly

Thank you again for sharing your experience with us. We hope to see you again soon

Additionally it is less than 100 yards from ART [Anaheim Resort Transit] the very low cost ride to Disneyland However it is a work in progress - The pool was potentially a beautiful site; including the now mandated ADA Handicapped access lifts for both the pool & the Spa - BUT it was obvious that they were understaffed as the deck around the area was dirty - just needed a good scrubbing; Ditto for the spa & the tiles on the side of the pool.   Another sign that it is a work in process - the toilet was a modern elongated bowl, the seat [obviously a replacement], was for an older round bowl The phone in

Summary: Had a four day stay over Mother's Day. The staff was extremely accomodating, rooms clean, plenty of towels etc. The room had a refer, micro, safe and while the television was an older model(no flat screen here) and the wifi annoying the room was an excellent value for the price. Free parking with a shuttle stop very close and a very minimal but plentiful continental breakfast added to the value

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights with a youth cheer group. We totaled 42 people which can be Intimidating.   The staff were all so helpful and friendly.  When there was a problem they were quick to rectify it.  The breakfast was decent (eggs, cereal, bread and pastries, fruit).  The carpet is new and housekeeping were excellent.  Wifi is problematic and sketchy but that could have been multi youth usage. We were so close to Disney and the convention centre, convenience stores and small restaurants  that the location was perfect.    Pool is small but nice.  Thanks for the friendly stay!  You were awesome hosts.

Summary: Very friendly, helpful staff(especially Jaqueline) and quiet place; I was at the 2nd fl so not sure about the noise level on the 1st floor. WiFi is an issue, got a bit annoying with the repeated drops. Breakfast is served 7-9, but if you are still hungry, there is a Denny's across the street. Overall, it's not the Merriot, but for people under a budget wanting to visit Disneyland,this place is a good alternative.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights. The rooms were very clean and quite. The staffs were very very friendly and accommodating. The location is perfect, within walking distance from Disney Land. Accommodations such as free WiFi, free continental breakfast, and a pool. I strongly recommend this hotel. We will definitely stay here again the next time we go to Anaheim.

Summary: Check in was easy. Staff was beyond nice! The room was clean and the beds were comfy. When waking up in the morning, we noticed a moldy smell near the sink. I think they may have had a plumbing issue at some point and forgot to clean the carpet. I let the front desk person know that they needed to check it out.  Free breakfast was donuts, muffins, yogurt, juice- stuff like that. Nothing special but fine if you're not picky. Denny's and Carls Jr  are within walking distance.   I guess if you're in great shape, you could walk to Dland or Cal Ad but I'm NOT and I had a 5 year old with me who had NO intention to walk back to the motel after a full day at both parks- I don't blame him!  All and all- it was fine.

Summary: Basic motel style accommodation. Fantastic location for Disney about half an hours walk or 2 min walk to the bus stop for shuttle. Surrounding area also has quite a few different options - we never ate at the same place twice. Also 24hr service station next door which was handy for drinks/band aids as you needed them.   Check in was easy. We arrived early and decided to go to Disney so the lady behind the desk offered us to check in early (for $20) or to watch our bags for us for free. As we didn't need the room yet we left our bags in her office and headed off.   The door to our room was very tricky to open. One marine nice man said he would fix it once we checked out, while another said there's just a trick to it. Either way it took us several turns to get in each time.   The

Summary: Our room was clean & quiet; beds were comfortable and housekeeping kept us well supplied.  We didn't swim as the pool was chilly for us but the hot tub was awesome.  Staff was very friendly and accomodating; free continental breakfast was good.  Close enough to walk to D-Land but very easy to catch the ART when we didn't want to walk.  Several restaurants and an AM/PM close to the hotel.  The only ding I can give our stay was that the carpets weren't very clean, but the rest of the room was very clean.  Overall this hotel is a really good value and we would stay here again.

We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: It's simple with a fantastic location
Summary: The location is perfect. Easy access to the highways, Disney and the convention center. You can walk to Disney and the convention center. There is a gas station opened 24/7 next door, very convenient and restaurants close by as well. But they have room service and that is great!!! Free breakfast, simple but free. Also the free parking and wi-fi. Polite staff. Overall I liked it and would stay there again.  The room is very basic, simple. If you are looking for comfort, not the hotel for you! Old building and you can tell they don't care much to upgrade the bathroom, beds and such. The AC/heater worked fine but oh boy, is it noisy?!? But it's a good hotel if you are not staying in there and are in town on a short trip, simply looking for a place to sleep and shower.
Manager Response: Dear Cris G, Thank you for staying with us! We are glad you appreciate our friendly hotel staff, complimentary breakfast  and convenient location.  We look forward to your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Came here for Blizzcon 2014. I reserved a room for Anaheim Hilton Hotel then they told me it was full, ask me to find another one, for time pressure and with no choice I choose this one. surprisingly I found out that the staff of this Inn is really friendly and nice, everything is just quite good enough for this price. location is great that you can easily move to convenient store or restaurants by walk, especially Anaheim convention center or Disneyland. room is clean and space is wide. free WiFi is useful and fast. even though you can't compare to 5-star hotel equipment. but to what I stayed any 4,5-star hotels before, this one's price is just right beyond what you expect.

Summary: sandra at the front desk was incredibly helpful when I realized I forgot to print my barcode for my blizzcon tickets! Good location, just wish the wifi was a little better, other than that great place to stay.

Room d√©cor is dated, and the lock on the door was very finicky to get into the room.  A/C loud, but efficient.  The girl at the front desk was great! super friendly and helpful.   We did not have the breakfast.  We purchased Disney tickets through agent recommended by Desk clerk, and enjoyed complimentary shuttle to and from Disney both days.  It would have been a long walk back from Disney after a full day.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle M.  Thank you so much for your recent stay and your feedback. While we are glad you appreciate our friendly hotel staff, clean and comfortable beds; we are sorry to hear that we felt short on your expectation about the room carpet and decor....We have recently changed the product using to shampoo carpet to prevent carpet dye bleeding. As you can imagine, being so close to Disneyland and Convention Center, the market demand during the convention weekend was very high and we charged less than other hotels in the area. We hope you will come back to stay with us next time you are in town, we will do all we can to improve in the meantime.

Summary Heading: Dont judge a book by its cover.

Even though we didn't arrive until close to 11:00 pm the staff was friendly and got us checked in quickly.  I was not able to check in with a different ID and credit card then on file so that did take a couple minutes extra.    Once checked in it was a very short distance to our main floor room.  Our key was very tricky and you needed to be quick on the draw to get our door open, but we finally did.  The room itself was spacious and clean and the beds were very comfortable. The A/C unit was quite loud, but it worked and that was most important.    When we

Summary: My teen sons and I stayed at this Inn for 5 nights.  Fantastic location just 20 min walk to Disneyland and close to major shopping centres.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  The room was clean, beds comfy and they were made daily and the room was restocked with clean towels and toiletries daily.  Major tour company just up the road so they do a hotel pick up and drop off depending on the tour you choose. Free WiFi was a bonus and breakfast was good.  Would definitely stay there again.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights, clean room, rug have pieces of fabric sticking out...they need to mow the carpet..continental breakfast is good, cereals, muffins, toast , juices, hard boiled eggs...very doable. Close to a lot of restaurants..price is reasonable. Probably stay there again.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean rooms, great value!
Summary: This hotel is in a great little location - 15/20mins walk to Disney, or just a couple of stops on the ART bus. There's a cheap and cheerful mexican next door, and the reception staff were lovely and welcoming.  We were able to buy our Disney tickets through a third party at the reception desk which included a pick up and drop off an no extra cost - I highly recommend doing this, just to save the extra walk or bus fare. You can also grab tickets to other Anaheim/LA attractions through the same service.  The room was clean and simple - the beds were very comfy. The bathroom was small, with the sink on the outside in the main room.  Iron (and ironing board), coffee pot, microwave and small fridge in the room. The AC was good, but very noisy. Best strategy was to turn it on full,
Manager Response: Dear Emily O, I have shared your wonderful comments with our staff and we really enjoy to hear about your experiences with your stay at the Anaheim Express Inn. . Summary: After going thru numerous hotel reviews this hotel was the only one with great reviews for the price we were looking to pay.   We stayed three nights for our Disneyland vacation. Beds were made and the room was restocked with new towels and more coffee each day. The breakfast was good, lots of options like oatmeal, bagels, toast, cereal, yogurt, hard boiled eggs, muffins, coffee juice.  The only bad thing was our ac leaked and left a big trail down to the bottom floor, but the always has a caution wet floor sign up and towels down to prevent accidents.   It was a good 15 minute and walk to Disneyland but it wasnt that bad. We even managed to walk it back and forth for naps during the day.   Overall we'd definitely stay here again in the future.

A friendly girl named Sandra welcomed us very kindly and quickly gave us the keys to our room even arriving before 3pm official check in time. The continental breakfast was more I was expecting (bread, bagels, fruits, cereal, muffins, juices, coffee even eggs). AC was working perfect and the WiFi. The hotel location is perfect just right Harbor Blvd one of the principal way to access

Granted, it's no Westin or Sheraton, but it was clean, had VERY comfortable beds (with no 1980s bed covers), strong (but loud) ac, and free breakfast. The breakfast could have better selection but they did their job to
Manager Response: Dear Danny H,  What a joy to read your comments about your experiences with your stay at the Anaheim Express Inn. . Summary: I am a non-US visitor. I come to California, USA with my mother to visit some famous places here. I stay in Anaheim Express Inn in Orangewood Avenue. The hotel is not really big but the service is excellent. The hotel staff are friendly, enthusiastic, helpful and above all, they are professional. They are always ready to answer your questions 24 hours a day. For foreigners who meet difficulties in language and culture they help to make theselves at home.
